content.prompt: For Dido, depicted in the passage in her city, “Elissa” was

choices.label: a different name by which she was known
the name of the country from which she fled
the name of one of the Carthaginians’ neighbors

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
